sentences.en: ...an attempt by the president to disassociate the military from politics.
sentences.cn: ...总统对分离军政的一次尝试。

sentences.en: He proposed that the Council should disassociate itself from such behaviour.
sentences.cn: 他提议委员会应同这种行为撇清关系。

sentences.en: I intend to disassociate from all related disease machinery.
sentences.cn: 我意愿离开一切相关的疾病机械装置.

trans.tran_en: If you disassociate one group or thing from another, you separate them
